verbs.description: [ARG1: asian stocks] [V: gain] [ARGM-TMP: after chinese assurances over slowdown asian markets advanced monday lifted by chinese benchmarks after officials put a positive spin on the country slowing economy keeping score the shanghai composite index jumped 4 2 percent to 2 656 65 and the hang seng in hong kong surged 2 2 percent to 26 123 24 japan nikkei 225 index reversed early losses gaining 0 4 percent to 22 614 82 and the kospi in south korea added 0 1 percent to 2 158 81 australia s&p - asx 200 countered the trend shedding] 0 6 percent to 5 904 90 shares rose in taiwan singapore and the philippines but were flat in indonesia official washington new york mercantile exchange japan taiwan russell new york brent crude south korea manhattan cimb private banking australia empire of japan singapore procter gamble u s paypal china analyst philippines indonesia american express hang seng hong kong

asian stocks gain after [ARG1: chinese assurances over slowdown asian markets] advanced monday [V: lifted] [ARG0: by chinese benchmarks] [ARGM-TMP: after officials put a positive spin on the country slowing economy] keeping score the shanghai composite index jumped 4 2 percent to 2 656 65 and the hang seng in hong kong surged 2 2 percent to 26 123 24 japan nikkei 225 index reversed early losses gaining 0 4 percent to 22 614 82 and the kospi in south korea added 0 1 percent to 2 158 81 australia s&p - asx 200 countered the trend shedding 0 6 percent to 5 904 90 shares rose in taiwan singapore and the philippines but were flat in indonesia official washington new york mercantile exchange japan taiwan russell new york brent crude south korea manhattan cimb private banking australia empire of japan singapore procter gamble u s paypal china analyst philippines indonesia american express hang seng hong kong
